textBeforeTable: The Bourne Conspiracy - Q&A on Internode Games Network. Kynogon announces Kynapse support for Nintendo Wii. Killzone 2 PlayStation 3 Screenshots. Demo: Culdcept SAGA on Xbox LIVE. Rock Band Content (Black Sabbath) on Xbox LIVE. Xbox 360 Dash update is now available. [Dec 04, 2007, 10:34 am ET] - Share - Viewing Comments Morning Consolidation --> Blue's News Favorite! textAfterTable: 3. Re: Killzone Dec 4, 2007, 12:05 Xenopulse   I agree about KZ. There's no question that this is one of the best-looking games ever. But the gameplay? Single play looks okay, with cover system and the likes. But what about multiplayer? Coop? Vehicles? Playing as Helghast? We'll also see where Haze falls, and what KZ will learn from that.
